color.code:
return context.item.data?.['title'] === "Dogs"
  ? "#61378D"
  : context.item.data?.['title'] === "Cats"
  ? "#FF6E06"
  : context.item.data?.['title'] === "Birds"
  ? "#F1D23E"
  : "#000000"; // default fallback

default.animationKeyframes: @keyframes fadeIn { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } }

children.code: return [{"icon":"lucide/dog","title":"Dogs","description":"From playful puppies to gentle seniors, we help street dogs find loving homes and provide medical care when they need it most."},{"icon":"lucide/cat","title":"Cats","description":"Independent yet loving, we rescue stray cats, provide spay/neuter services, and connect them with caring families who understand their unique needs."},{"icon":"lucide/bird","title":"Birds","description":"From injured pigeons to lost parrots, our network helps rehabilitate birds and reunite them with nature or their human families."}]

color.code:
return context.item.data?.['title'] === "Dogs"
  ? "#61378D"
  : context.item.data?.['title'] === "Cats"
  ? "#FF6E06"
  : context.item.data?.['title'] === "Birds"
  ? "#F1D23E"
  : "#000000"; // default fallback

children.code: return [{"icon":"lucide/dog","title":"Dogs","description":"From playful puppies to gentle seniors, we help street dogs find loving homes and provide medical care when they need it most."},{"icon":"lucide/cat","title":"Cats","description":"Independent yet loving, we rescue stray cats, provide spay/neuter services, and connect them with caring families who understand their unique needs."},{"icon":"lucide/bird","title":"Birds","description":"From injured pigeons to lost parrots, our network helps rehabilitate birds and reunite them with nature or their human families."}]

defaultValue.title: Post a Case
defaultValue.description: Create a detailed case for adoption, medical help, or rescue with photos and location.

defaultValue.title: Volunteers Get Notified
defaultValue.description: Local volunteers and rescuers receive alerts based on proximity and expertise.

defaultValue.title: Join Relevant Group Chat
defaultValue.description: Coordinate efforts in real-time through our dedicated chat groups.

defaultValue.title: Get Help / Approve Adoptions
defaultValue.description: Receive assistance or review adoption applications through the app.

defaultValue.title: Stay Connected
defaultValue.description: Follow up on cases, share success stories, and build a compassionate community.
